body: Hi, I love this server. But I got banned for using mods/hacks. I would never do this. Can  somebody help. Please respond, anyone.
body_tagged: Hi, I love this server. But I got banned for using mods/hacks. I would never do this. Can  somebody help. Please respond, anyone.
title: Introducing Myself

replies.body: Hey welcome! About you ban, staff will appeal that no problem since you've waited 2 years o-o make sure you read the server rules when you rejoin https://avicus.net/rules hope you stick around the forums!
replies.body_tagged: Hey welcome! About you ban, staff will appeal that no problem since you've waited 2 years o-o make sure you read the server rules when you rejoin https://avicus.net/rules hope you stick around the forums!

replies.body: 99250, Nice to meet you :). Thank you sooo much for replying. I have contacted them but they won't respond. Can u help me please?
replies.body_tagged: 99250, Nice to meet you :). Thank you sooo much for replying. I have contacted them but they won't respond. Can u help me please?

replies.body:
I'm sure they will respond soon. :D

  Also little tip: hit the "reply" button on forum posts it directly responds to that user.
